description.zh-cn: 以色列政治人物，现任以色列总理及执政党利库德集团主席。曾三度出任总理，为以色列建国以来任期最长的总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician serving as the current prime minister of Israel and chairman of the Likud party. He has served as prime minister on three separate occasions, making him the longest-serving prime minister in the country's history.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的一个右翼政党。
description.en: A major right-wing political party in Israel.

description.zh-cn: 波兰犹太裔历史教授，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的父亲。
description.en: A Polish-born Israeli historian and the father of Benjamin Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 以色列特种部队军官，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的长兄，在恩德培行动中阵亡。
description.en: An Israel Defense Forces (IDF) officer, the older brother of Benjamin Netanyahu, who was killed in action during Operation Entebbe.

description.zh-cn: 一次由以色列国防军于乌干达恩德培国际机场策划的反劫机任务。
description.en: A counter-terrorist hostage-rescue mission carried out by commandos of the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) at Entebbe Airport in Uganda.

description.zh-cn: 以色列心理学家，本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的第三任妻子。
description.en: An Israeli educational and career psychologist, and the third wife of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州剑桥市的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

description.zh-cn: 以色列国的军队。
description.en: The military forces of the State of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，曾任以色列总理和总统。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the ninth President of Israel and as the eighth Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦伊斯兰教逊尼派组织。
description.en: A Palestinian Sunni-Islamic fundamentalist organization.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦政治家，曾任巴勒斯坦解放组织执委会主席。
description.en: A Palestinian political leader who was Chairman of the Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO).

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，曾于1999年至2001年担任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the tenth prime minister of Israel from 1999 to 2001.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家和将军，曾于2001年至2006年担任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli general and politician who served as the 11th prime minister of Israel from 2001 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 2005年以色列单方面撤出加沙地带所有以色列定居点的计划。
description.en: A 2005 unilateral Israeli plan to withdraw all Israeli settlements from the Gaza Strip.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、商人和电视名人，曾任第45任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician, media personality, and businessman who served as the 45th president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家和前军事将领。
description.en: An Israeli politician and former military general.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，以色列是我们的家园党领导人。
description.en: An Israeli politician who is the leader of the Yisrael Beiteinu party.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，于2021年至2022年担任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who served as the 13th prime minister of Israel from 2021 to 2022.

nodes.id: 阿维哈伊·曼德尔卜利特

zh-cn: 阿维哈伊·曼德尔卜利特

description.zh-cn: 以色列法学家，曾于2016年至2022年担任以色列总检察长。
description.en: An Israeli jurist who served as the Attorney General of Israel from 2016 to 2022.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的法院之一。
description.en: One of the district courts in Israel.

description.zh-cn: 由内塔尼亚胡政府提出的一系列旨在削弱司法部门权力的改革方案。
description.en: A series of changes to the judicial system proposed by the Netanyahu government, aimed at curbing the judiciary's influence.

description.zh-cn: 针对2023年以色列司法改革方案的全国性抗议活动。
description.en: A series of nationwide protests in Israel against the proposed 2023 judicial reform.

description.zh-cn: 始于2023年10月7日，哈马斯对以色列发动袭击后，以色列与巴勒斯坦武装组织之间爆发的军事冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict between Israel and Palestinian militant groups led by Hamas, which began on 7 October 2023 with an attack by Hamas on Israel.

description.zh-cn: 位于荷兰海牙的国际司法机构，负责审理种族灭绝罪、危害人类罪、战争罪和侵略罪。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization and international tribunal that sits in The Hague in the Netherlands, with jurisdiction to prosecute individuals for genocide, crimes against humanity, war crimes, and the crime of aggression.

description.zh-cn: 英国律师，现任国际刑事法院检察官。
description.en: A British lawyer serving as Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家和前军事将领，曾任以色列国防部长。
description.en: An Israeli politician and former military officer who served as Minister of Defense.

nodes.id: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令

zh-cn: 国际刑事法院对本雅明·内塔尼亚胡等人的逮捕令
en: ICC arrest warrants for Benjamin Netanyahu and others

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院于2024年11月21日对以色列总理内塔尼亚胡和前国防部长加兰特签发的逮捕令，指控其涉嫌战争罪和危害人类罪。
description.en: Arrest warrants issued by the International Criminal Court on November 21, 2024, for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and former Defense Minister Yoav Gallant for alleged war crimes and crimes against humanity.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任第44任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 44th president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾于2011年至2015年担任美国众议院议长。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 53rd Speaker of the United States House of Representatives from 2011 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: 以色列的第二大城市。
description.en: The second most populous city in Israel.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡是本锡安·内塔尼亚胡的儿子。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu is the son of Benzion Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡是约纳坦·内塔尼亚胡的弟弟。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu is the younger brother of Yonatan Netanyahu.

description.zh-cn: 约纳坦·内塔尼亚胡在恩德培行动中阵亡。
description.en: Yonatan Netanyahu was killed in action during Operation Entebbe.

description.zh-cn: 莎拉·内塔尼亚胡是本雅明·内塔尼亚胡的第三任妻子。
description.en: Sara Netanyahu is the third wife of Benjamin Netanyahu.

degree.zh-cn: 建筑学学士、管理学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Science in Architecture, Master of Science in Management

description.zh-cn: 1971年获得建筑学学士学位，1973年在斯隆管理学院获得管理学硕士学位。
description.en: He received a BS in architecture in 1971 and an MS in management from the Sloan School of Management in 1973.

description.zh-cn: 曾在哈佛大学学习政治学。
description.en: Studied political science at Harvard University.

description.zh-cn: 1967年至1973年间在以色列国防军服役，官至上尉。
description.en: Served in the Israel Defense Forces from 1967 to 1973, reaching the rank of captain.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡曾三度担任以色列总理。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu has served three tenures as Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡曾两度担任利库德集团主席。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu has twice served as the chairman of the Likud party.

description.zh-cn: 在1996年以色列总理直选中，内塔尼亚胡作为挑战者击败了时任总理希蒙·佩雷斯。
description.en: In the 1996 Israeli general election for Prime Minister, Netanyahu challenged and defeated the incumbent Prime Minister Shimon Peres.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡一直不信任巴勒斯坦解放组织领导人亚西尔·阿拉法特，并对其采取强硬政策。
description.en: Netanyahu consistently distrusted PLO leader Yasser Arafat and adopted a hardline policy towards him.

description.zh-cn: 在1999年大选中，埃胡德·巴拉克击败了内塔尼亚胡。
description.en: In the 1999 election, Ehud Barak defeated Netanyahu.

position.zh-cn: 外交部长, 财政部长
position.en: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Minister of Finance

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡在沙龙政府中先后担任外交部长和财政部长。
description.en: Netanyahu served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and later Minister of Finance in Ariel Sharon's government.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡威胁辞职以反对加沙撤军计划，并于2005年8月7日正式辞去财政部长职务以示抗议。
description.en: Netanyahu threatened to resign in opposition to the Gaza disengagement plan and officially resigned as Finance Minister on August 7, 2005, in protest.

description.zh-cn: 2020年4月21日，内塔尼亚胡与政治对手本尼·甘茨同意组建联合政府。
description.en: On April 21, 2020, Netanyahu and his political rival Benny Gantz agreed to form a unity government.

description.zh-cn: 纳夫塔利·贝内特成为新任总理，结束了内塔尼亚胡长达12年的执政。
description.en: Naftali Bennett became the new prime minister, ending Netanyahu's 12-year rule.

relationships.source: 阿维哈伊·曼德尔卜利特

description.zh-cn: 时任以色列总检察长阿维哈伊·曼德尔卜利特宣布打算就贿赂和欺诈指控对内塔尼亚胡提出起诉，并于同年11月21日正式起诉。
description.en: Then-Attorney General of Israel Avichai Mandelblit announced his intention to file an indictment against Netanyahu on charges of bribery and fraud on February 28, 2019, and formally indicted him on November 21 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 耶路撒冷地方法院就内塔尼亚胡涉嫌贪腐等指控开庭审理。
description.en: The Jerusalem District Court began trial proceedings for Netanyahu on charges of corruption.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡于2023年1月公布了司法改革方案，企图削减司法部门的影响力。
description.en: In January 2023, Netanyahu unveiled a judicial reform plan aimed at curbing the influence of the judiciary.

description.zh-cn: 全国性的示威活动旨在反对并阻止司法改革方案的通过。
description.en: The nationwide demonstrations aimed to oppose and block the passage of the judicial reform plan.

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院于2024年11月21日对内塔尼亚胡签发逮捕令，指控其涉嫌战争罪和危害人类罪。
description.en: The International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for Netanyahu on November 21, 2024, for alleged war crimes and crimes against humanity.

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院检察官卡里姆·艾哈迈德汗于2024年5月20日申请对内塔尼亚胡的逮捕令。
description.en: ICC Prosecutor Karim Ahmad Khan applied for an arrest warrant for Netanyahu on May 20, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡被指与奥巴马政府关系欠佳，双方在两国方案等问题上存在分歧。
description.en: Netanyahu was reported to have a poor relationship with the Obama administration, with disagreements on issues such as the two-state solution.

description.zh-cn: 自特朗普政府上任以来，美以关系出现明显好转，特朗普采取了亲以色列的立场。
description.en: Since the Trump administration took office, U.S.-Israel relations improved significantly, with Trump adopting a pro-Israel stance.

description.zh-cn: 内塔尼亚胡持有强烈的反伊朗立场，反对伊朗拥有核武器，并指控其支持恐怖主义。
description.en: Netanyahu holds a strong anti-Iran stance, opposing its nuclear program and accusing it of supporting terrorism.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国众议院议长约翰·博纳邀请内塔尼亚胡到美国国会就伊朗核协议发表演讲。
description.en: Then-Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives John Boehner invited Netanyahu to address a joint session of Congress regarding the Iran nuclear deal.
